boat.name: Whaler Tiare
boat.full_description: Built originally for the Navy in the 1980's, Whaler Tiare was the subject of an extensive strip to bare conversion in the early 2000's.

for_sales.sales_text:
Whaler Tiare was built as a naval motor whaler in the 1980's. She has a gunter rig, loose footed mail, roller reefing headsail and gennaker with snuffer. She draws 18' or 6" with the centreboard down.

Sale includes

  • Yanmar 2GM 20 inboard
  • battery
  • Jabsco toilet (new 2016)
  • feathering max prop
  • yard trailer
  • Plastimo gas hob and grill
  • Waeco fridge/freezer
  • all interior cushions
  • cockpit cover
  • all standing and running rigging
  • inflatable dinghy
  • pump
  • oars and seat
Built for the navy in 1980's she was converted in the early 2000's, resulting in a robust seaworthy and superbly attractive vessel. She is not a vessel for those seeking comfort but for those who appreciate real quality sailing with a naval pedigree.

Currently comissioned and being enjoyed in the Solent.

More information at Apollo Duck.
